description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the issue of the password dialog box not appearing during sign-in:

1. After entering your email address and clicking the connect button, press any key on the keyboard immediately after the initial
blip:
2. This will prompt the password dialog box to display normally, allowing for successful sign-in.

**Details**:
This workaround seems to mitigate a timing issue where the password dialog does not appear as expected. Continuously pressing a key may help stabilize the interaction, especially in certain video configurations. (LLM Synthesized)
